name: HomologicalComplex.smul_f_apply
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝³ : Semiring R
C : Type u_2
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_5, u_2} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Preadditive C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Linear R C
ι : Type u_4
c : ComplexShape ι
X Y : HomologicalComplex C c
r : R
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
n : ι
⊢ Eq ((HSMul.hSMul r f).f n) (HSMul.hSMul r (f.f n))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma smul_f_apply (r : R) (f : X ⟶ Y) (n : ι) : (r • f).f n = r • f.f n := rfl

name: CategoryTheory.Functor.mapHomologicalComplex_linear

inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Functor.Linear R F
c : ComplexShape ι
⊢ CategoryTheory.Functor.Linear R (F.mapHomologicalComplex c)
decl:
